name: Kaiju Invasion 2088
description:
Game Made in 1 week for kajam 2021.

The year is 2088.

Giant monsters, called Kaijus, have overtaken the planet.

The remains of humanity, gathered in fortified cities, have come together to build the ultimate Mecha.

As a Mecha pilot, the safety of these cities is between your hands.

For the best experience, please play in full screen and with a controller.

Controller controls :

-Move : Left stick

-Jump : A

-Punch : X

-Shield : B

-Special : Y

-Dash : RT

Keyboard controls :

-Move : WASD

-Jump : Space

-Punch : Enter

-Shield : Ctrl

-Special : Tab

-Dash : Shift
